game.name: YURA
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Co-op, Online Co-op, Steam Achievements, Color Alternatives, Custom Volume Controls, Stereo Sound, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: YURA — 1-4 players trying not to kill each other on the way up. Cliffs. Deserts. House-sized mechs. Gliders over chasms. Absolute physics, total freedom, and zero safety nets. Climb. Fall. Drag your friends with you. To the top — or down with the whole crew.
game.shortDescriptionEn: YURA — 1-4 players trying not to kill each other on the way up. Cliffs. Deserts. House-sized mechs. Gliders over chasms. Absolute physics, total freedom, and zero safety nets. Climb. Fall. Drag your friends with you. To the top — or down with the whole crew.
